00025 #ifndef __Sphere_H_
00026 #define __Sphere_H_
00027 
00028 // Precompiler options
00029 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00030 
00031 #include "OgreVector3.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00035 
00042     class _OgreExport Sphere
00043     {
00044     protected:
00045         Real mRadius;
00046         Vector3 mCenter;
00047     public:
00049         Sphere() : mRadius(1.0), mCenter(Vector3::ZERO) {}
00054         Sphere(const Vector3& center, Real radius)
00055             : mRadius(radius), mCenter(center) {}
00056 
00058         Real getRadius(void) const { return mRadius; }
00059 
00061         void setRadius(Real radius) { mRadius = radius; }
00062 
00064         const Vector3& getCenter(void) const { return mCenter; }
00065 
00067         void setCenter(const Vector3& center) { mCenter = center; }
00068 
00070         bool intersects(const Sphere& s) const
00071         {
00072             return (s.mCenter - mCenter).squaredLength() <=
00073                 Math::Sqr(s.mRadius + mRadius);
00074         }
00076         bool intersects(const AxisAlignedBox& box) const
00077         {
00078             return Math::intersects(*this, box);
00079         }
00081         bool intersects(const Plane& plane) const
00082         {
00083             return Math::intersects(*this, plane);
00084         }
00086         bool intersects(const Vector3& v) const
00087         {
00088             return ((v - mCenter).squaredLength() <= Math::Sqr(mRadius));
00089         }
00090         
00091 
00092     };
00093 
00094 }
00095 
00096 #endif
